review: Recommended by a relative I met Dr Sudhir B.S in 2015, and thereafter there has been no looking back. He is the modern Dhanwantari. His treatment is exemplary., *** ********* ** ***** My family, friends all swear by him now. A gentle, dignified person, deeply spiritual, he instills confidence in his patients as few doctors know how to do today. I owe my life to him. Stage 4 Sarcoidosis, cardio myopathy at the stage of collapse, he brought me back from death. Not once but twice. ** ** ********* ** *** **** *** **** *

** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********** He is exemplary in diagnosis and gets to the root of the issue and recommends best treatment accordingly. He has been a go to person and saviour for many of our family members for years now. The way he explains about any medical condition is so easy for any common person to understand. One can completely rely on him for the best treatment and I always recommend my friends and relatives to leverage his expertise for best treatment. Want to really thank from for all the great work he has done to our family members. Thank you doctor üôè
